JUMPSUIT: A one-piece item of clothing originally used by parachutists
MULLET: A fish of the family Mullidae (order Syngnathiformes), especially the genus Mullus (the red ______s or goatfish).
NEON: The chemical element (symbol Ne) with an atomic number of 10. The lightest of the noble gases, it is a colourless, odorless inert gas.
SPANDEX: A synthetic fibre known for its exceptional elasticity.
WINDBREAKER: A thin outer coat designed to resist wind chill and light rain.
